name: strfv3
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(c5, c2)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c5, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(c5, c2)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c5, c2))

stmt.origin: eqtr4d(c1, cfv(c5, c2), cfv(c5, c3), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(c5, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(c5, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c5, c2), cfv(c5, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c5, c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(c5, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c5, c2), cfv(c5, c3)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(c5, c3)), wcel(c1, c6))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(c5, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
-| wi(wcel(c1, c6), wceq(c1, cfv(c5, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c5, c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c5, c2), cfv(c5, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
-| wi(wcel(c1, c6), wceq(c1, cfv(c5, c3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c1, c6), wceq(c1, cfv(c5, c3)))
-| wbr(c3, cstr, c4)
-| wceq(c5, cslot(cfv(c5, cnx)))
-| wss(csn(cop(cfv(c5, cnx), c1)), c3)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c1 ∈ c6 → c1 =(c5 ` c3))
⊣ c3[Struct]c4
⊣ c5 = Slot((c5 ` ndx))
⊣ { <(c5 ` ndx), c1 > } ⊆ c3

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c5, c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c5, c2), cfv(c5, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
-| wbr(c3, cstr, c4)
-| wceq(c5, cslot(cfv(c5, cnx)))
-| wss(csn(cop(cfv(c5, cnx), c1)), c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c5, c2), cfv(c5, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c5, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
-| wbr(c3, cstr, c4)

-| wss(csn(cop(cfv(c5, cnx), c1)), c3)

comment: Variant on ~ strfv for large structures. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2017.)
